name: Polteageist
description: This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.effect: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
